author: dude57
title: My 4th visit to India
text: # 1 I am planning a trip to India November for 16 days in November/December. This will be my 4th trip. I've been to Ladakh, Tamil Nadu, Kerala, Agra and Rajasthan. I have an idea of landing in Delhi and taking an overnight train to Amritsar, From Amritsar I want o continue east to Khajuraho, Varanasi and finally Sundarbans National Park. I would fly home from Kolkata. I know this is a very big stretch. The other idea is to concentrate on Varanasi, and east, include time in Assam and skip Amritsar. Although Amritsar is very high on my list of places I want to see.
